def fruit_salad_ratio(x, y):
    total_apples_oranges = 12 - x - 12
    ratio = x / total_apples_oranges
    return ratio

def fruit_salad_ratio(x, y):
    total_apples_oranges = (12 - x) * 12
    ratio = x / total_apples_oranges
    return ratio
